Text:
This film rocks! It's up there with Pan's Labyrinth. I've been waiting ages for it to come up as a DVD5 and it only has Spanish subtitles - Bugger!

Any chance anyone has a version with English subs?

Yes, I just uploaded one with English subs.

Download it here:
